title: Elissa Slotkin
added: In September 2019, Slotkin and six other freshmen Democratic members of the U.S. House authored an opinion editorial in ''The Washington Post'' calling for an impeachment inquiry into President [[Donald Trump]]. The publication of the editorial led to widespread Democratic support for an impeachment inquiry.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Pathé |first1=Simone |title=Facing pro-Trump chants, Elissa Slotkin explains support for impeachment |url=https://www.rollcall.com/2019/12/16/facing-pro-trump-chants-elissa-slotkin-explains-support-for-impeachment/ |access-date=19 March 2021 |work=Roll Call |date=16 December 2019 |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |last1=Stolberg |first1=Sheryl Gay |title=Slotkin, Backing Impeachment, Draws Instant Protests, and Applause |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/16/us/politics/slotkin-impeachment.html |access-date=19 March 2021 |work=The New York Times |date=16 December 2019}}</ref>

title: Elissa Slotkin
added: In September 2019, Slotkin and six other freshmen Democratic members of the U.S. House authored an opinion editorial in ''The Washington Post'' calling for an impeachment inquiry into President [[Donald Trump]]. The publication of the editorial led to widespread Democratic support for an impeachment inquiry.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Pathé |first1=Simone |title=Facing pro-Trump chants, Elissa Slotkin explains support for impeachment |url=https://www.rollcall.com/2019/12/16/facing-pro-trump-chants-elissa-slotkin-explains-support-for-impeachment/ |access-date=19 March 2021 |work=Roll Call |date=16 December 2019 |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |last1=Stolberg |first1=Sheryl Gay |title=Slotkin, Backing Impeachment, Draws Instant Protests, and Applause |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/16/us/politics/slotkin-impeachment.html |access-date=19 March 2021 |work=The New York Times |date=16 December 2019}}</ref>Slotkin voted for the [[First impeachment of Donald Trump|first]] and [[Second impeachment of Donald Trump|second impeachments]] of Donald Trump.
